descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#b39da1][size=4][b]AAAaaaaaaaAAaaaaAAAaaaAaAAhhh!![/b][/size][/color]
[youtube]6GmgF9n7Kak[/youtube][/center]
[heading][color=#b39da1]Installation[/color][/heading]Copy "Meshes" folder into your "Data" directory.
(Place "paired_h2hkillmovesuplex.HkX" in "Skyrim/data/meshes/actors/character/animations/patch_1.5/")
[heading][color=#b39da1]Uninstallation[/color][/heading]This mod has no esp, no script, no havok behavior, so never dirty your save file. [color=red]You can uninstall it whenever you want.[/color]
Delete "paired_h2hkillmovesuplex.HkX".
[heading][color=#b39da1]Known Issues[/color][/heading]I don't care, you don't care.
[heading][color=#b39da1]Changelog[/color][/heading]v1.0.0 2014-02-12 (Initial Release)
+Added paired_h2hkillmovesuplex
[heading][color=#b39da1]Credit[/color][/heading]Yukl
web: [url=http://yuklryvius.tumblr.com/]http://yuklryvius.tumblr.com/[/url]
